titulo: Cuentos Para Dormir [Bedtime Stories]: Historias Relajantes del Sueño para la Meditación Diaria Guiada.Hipnosis del Sueño Profundo para Conciliar el Sueño Rápidamente y ... y Ataques de Pánico [Relaxing Sleep Stories for Guided Daily Meditation. Deep Sleep Hypnosis to Quickly Fall Asleep and ... and Panic Attacks]
descripcion:
Are you tired of continuously moving and turning in your bed without falling asleep for hours? 
This proven guided meditations and stories are scientifically proven to relax your mind, body, and soul. For ultimate relaxation and peaceful vibes. 
Use the stories as part of a breathing exercise, as nighttime meditation, or just to help you unwind at the end of a long day. 
More interesting than white noise. 
More engaging than nature sounds. 
Don't wait any longer. Buy this audiobook now and start tonight!
